name: The Crypto Miner
description:
𝗚𝗮𝗺𝗲 𝗜𝗻𝗳𝗼

The Crypto Miner is a horror game based on a guy mining crypto coins.  The goal is to get access to  the secret website.  Also there are other things you should be aware of while mining crypto coins that will be presented to you in  the game.

This game was made entirely by TudyPie  except for some assets taken from the unity asset store.

𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐥𝐬 :

-  WASD = Move

- "C" or Left Ctrl = Crouch

- "F" = Flashlight

- E = Interact (Doors, Computer etc.)

- Space = Get up from computer

- Esc = Pause game

𝗠𝗶𝗻𝗶𝗺𝗮𝗹 𝗦𝘆𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗺 𝗥𝗲𝗾𝘂𝗶𝗿𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀 :

  • SO : Windows / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor : Dual core 2.4 GHz processor or better
  • Memory : 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics : Geforce GTX 420, Radeon RX 460, IntelHD 540
  • Storage : 100 MB available space

𝐓𝐮𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐢𝐚𝐥

In this game you have to mine crypto coins on the computer! You need a good internet connection so you can mine crypto coins faster. Buy routers at the shop! Your goal is to get acces to the secret website! Be careful! If you mine crypto coins for too long you can get hacked. If you don't want to get hacked you can use the antihack application available on your computer. The internet can go out if you mine for too long and also the electricity might go out when you use applications too much on your computer. And be careful because people will hunt you down so be sure to check the windows sometimes Good luck!

𝐀𝐝𝐝𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐈𝐧𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬

This game is just a DEMO and I am STILL WORKING on it.  You may experience a few BUGS! You can see game updates on my twitter @tudypie1 . If you enjoy the game please leave a comment with some feedback and maybe some ideas! Also this game was first made for the Diving_Squid Community Jam!
